meanings.sent1: After eating the beans, he felt gassy and uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: Certain foods like broccoli can make you feel gassy.
meanings.sent3: The gassy feeling after the big meal made him regret eating so much.

meanings.sent5: The gassy rumbling in his stomach was a sign of indigestion.
